text: is a Japanese footballer. He is a midfielder. ==Career== He was educated at and played for Setouchi High School & Kochi University before signing for J2 club, Mito HollyHock. In 2016, he signed for Albirex Niigata FC (Singapore) from the S.League on loan for 1 season.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/21846/ He returned to Kochi to play for Kochi United SC for the 2019 season. ==Club career statistics== As of 22 February 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 209 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
